body_html:
Cc @jart, @damienmg. I naively tried adding a @%ws% prefix similar to the third party BUILD files, but ws isn't defined inside tensorflow itself.

Here's an example of a problematic line: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl#L528
body_text:
Cc @jart, @damienmg.  I naively tried adding a @%ws% prefix similar to the third party BUILD files, but ws isn't defined inside tensorflow itself.
Here's an example of a problematic line: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl#L528
body:
Cc @jart, @damienmg.  I naively tried adding a `@%ws%` prefix similar to the third party BUILD files, but `ws` isn't defined inside tensorflow itself.

Here's an example of a problematic line: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl#L528
